fault.message: Subsystem failed with incorrect configuration item.

condition.message: VNET_MODE is set to an unknown mode.

cause.message: Invalid configuartion item detected in eucatyptus.conf file.

resolution.message:
Subsystem: ${component}, Cause: ${cause} .
The system network configuration on this node is not valid.
1. Edit /etc/eucalyptus/eucalyptus.conf 2. Set the VNET_MODE parameter to one of these values: SYSTEM STATIC MANAGED MANAGED_NOVLAN 3. Start the Eucalyptus service on this node using the appropriate name: On NC: service eucalyptus-nc restart On CLC: service eucalyptus-cloud restart On CC: service eucalyptus-cc cleanrestart 4. Verify that the system comes back up and behaves as you expected. Please report any problems or post a question on https://engage.eucalyptus.com/
